text: Krishna Bose (26 December 1930 â€“ 22 February 2020) was an Indian politician, educator and social worker. She as a Member of Parliament elected from the Jadavpur constituency in West Bengal as an All India Trinamool Congress candidate. She was a MP from 1996 to 2004. Bose was born in Dhaka, Bangladesh. Bose died on 22 February 2020 in Kolkata, West Bengal, India of stroke-related problems at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from West Bengal Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Trinamool Congress politicians
title: Krishna Bose
